product_name: Goal Zero Guide 10 Plus Battery Pack
long_description: The Goal Zero Guide 10 Plus battery pack cranks out 1 amp of power, letting you charge an iPad(R) or other tablets from the sun when used with the Nomad 7 solar panel (sold separately). Battery pack stores enough power to recharge your device up to 3 times per charge. Works with AA and AAA rechargeable batteries (comes with 4 AA batteries); AAA batteries require an adapter, which is included with the Goal Zero AAA batteries. Built-in LED flashlight runs 20+ hrs. per charge. The Goal Zero Guide 10 Battery Pack can also be charged up via USB from a wall outlet or computer.
short_description: The Goal Zero Guide 10 Plus battery pack cranks out 1 amp of power, letting you charge an iPad(R) or other tablets from the sun when used with the Nomad 7 solar panel (sold separately).
